question.title: Spring Hateos Json APi add included to the response
question.body:
I am working on using Spring Hateos Json APi as a replacement for crnk .As per the documentation. I was able to get the expected response when I retrieve a List of object ie when I did

import static com.toedter.spring.hateoas.jsonapi.MediaTypes.JSON_API_VALUE;
import org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel;

    @RestController
    @RequestMapping(value ="/cont, produces = JSON_API_VALUE)
    public class MovieController {
        @RequestMapping("/getMovieList",produces = JSON_API_VALUE)
public CollectionModel<Movie> getMovieList(){
  var movies = service.getAllMovies();
  return CollectionModel.of(movies);       
}    
    }

I am using following dependencies of Hateos and jsonapi

implementation 'org.springframework.boot:spring-boot-starter'
implementation 'com.toedter:spring-hateoas-jsonapi:2.1.3'
implementation 'org.springframework.boot:spring-boot-starter-hateoas'

and I get the expected response ie

{
  "data": [
{
    "id": "1",
    "type": "movies",
    "attributes": {
      "title": "Star Wars"
    }
  },
{
    "id": "2",
    "type": "movies",
    "attributes": {
      "title": "Star Wars2"
    }
  }
]
}

This is my movie class

public class Movie{
@JsonApiId
public String id;
public String name;
public List<Director> directorList;
}

I need to have included key also in the above movie list response ie

   {
      "data": [
    {
        "id": "1",
        "type": "movies",
        "attributes": {
          "title": "Star Wars"
        }
      },
    {
        "id": "2",
        "type": "movies",
        "attributes": {
          "title": "Star Wars2"
        }
      }
    ],
    "included":[
              {
              "id": "1",
             "type": "director",
               "attributes": {
                "name": "director"
                }
              }
            ]
          }

I tried using @JsonApiRelationShip but that added Relationship within the object and not the included key
